import React, { Component } from 'react' export default class ItemComponent extends Component { onShowAssignment =(id)=>{ // console.log('this is clicked id',id) this.props.onShowAssignmentPage(id) } render() { const assignment = this.props["assignmentCreate"] const showAssignment = this.onShowAssignment return (
{ (assignment === true)?

{this.props['title']}

Due:{this.props['due_time']}

:

{this.props['title']}

{this.props['created_time']}

 }
) } }
